titles.title: Biomanufacturing and Jobs Act of 2025
Biomanufacturing and Jobs Act of 2025
To amend the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to improve the biobased markets program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
